com.ericsson.otp.stdlib

Class OtpGenServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ericsson.otp.stdlib.OtpSysProcess
      • com.ericsson.otp.stdlib.OtpGenServer

  • public abstract class OtpGenServer
extends OtpSysProcess
    An abstract class for implementing a gen_server-like process. It should work as OTP gen_server. The methods you would usually implement on the callback module are abstract here so you have to implement it when inheriting from this class. Then, if you get hold of this process PID or registered name from a linked Erlang node, you can use gen_server functions (e.g. gen_server:call/2) with it.
    Author:
    Brujo Benavides <elbrujohalcon@inaka.net>

      • call

        public static com.ericsson.otp.erlang.OtpErlangObject call(com.ericsson.otp.erlang.OtpNode host,
                                                           com.ericsson.otp.erlang.OtpErlangPid server,
                                                           com.ericsson.otp.erlang.OtpErlangObject call)
                                                    throws com.ericsson.otp.erlang.OtpErlangException
        Equivalent to call(OtpNode, String, String, OtpErlangObject, long) with timeout = 5000
        Parameters:
        host - This node
        server - gen_server PID
        call - message to send
        Returns:
        the response from the server or null if timeout was met
        Throws:
        com.ericsson.otp.erlang.OtpErlangException - If the response from the server is invalid

      • call

        public static com.ericsson.otp.erlang.OtpErlangObject call(com.ericsson.otp.erlang.OtpNode host,
                                                           com.ericsson.otp.erlang.OtpErlangPid server,
                                                           com.ericsson.otp.erlang.OtpErlangObject call,
                                                           long timeout)
                                                    throws com.ericsson.otp.erlang.OtpErlangException
        Makes a synchronous call to the gen_server server by sending a request and waiting until a reply arrives or a timeout occurs. The gen_server will call Module:handle_call/3 to handle the request.
        Parameters:
        host - This node
        server - gen_server PID
        call - message to send
        timeout - Timeout is a long which specifies how many milliseconds to wait for a reply, or 0 to wait indefinitely. If no reply is received within the specified time, the function call returns null.
        Returns:
        the response from the server or null if timeout was met
        Throws:
        com.ericsson.otp.erlang.OtpErlangException - If the response from the server is invalid

      • call

        public static com.ericsson.otp.erlang.OtpErlangObject call(com.ericsson.otp.erlang.OtpNode host,

                                                           java.lang.String node,
                                                           com.ericsson.otp.erlang.OtpErlangObject call)
                                                    throws com.ericsson.otp.erlang.OtpErlangException
        Equivalent to call(OtpNode, String, String, OtpErlangObject, long) with timeout = 5000
        Parameters:
        host - This node
        server - gen_server registered name
        node - node where the gen_server lives
        call - message to send
        Returns:
        the response from the server or null if timeout was met
        Throws:
        com.ericsson.otp.erlang.OtpErlangException - If the response from the server is invalid

      • call

        public static com.ericsson.otp.erlang.OtpErlangObject call(com.ericsson.otp.erlang.OtpNode host,
                                                           java.lang.String server,

                                                           com.ericsson.otp.erlang.OtpErlangObject call,
                                                           long timeout)
                                                    throws com.ericsson.otp.erlang.OtpErlangException
        Makes a synchronous call to the gen_server server by sending a request and waiting until a reply arrives or a timeout occurs. The gen_server will call Module:handle_call/3 to handle the request.
        Parameters:
        host - This node
        server - gen_server registered name
        node - node where the gen_server lives
        call - message to send
        timeout - Timeout is an long which specifies how many milliseconds to wait for a reply, or 0 to wait indefinitely. If no reply is received within the specified time, the function call returns null.
        Returns:
        the response from the server or null if timeout was met
        Throws:
        com.ericsson.otp.erlang.OtpErlangException - If the response from the server is invalid

      • cast

        public static void cast(com.ericsson.otp.erlang.OtpNode host,
                        com.ericsson.otp.erlang.OtpErlangPid server,
                        com.ericsson.otp.erlang.OtpErlangObject cast)
        Sends an asynchronous request to the a gen_server and returns immediately, ignoring if the destination node or gen_server does not exist. The gen_server will call Module:handle_cast/2 to handle the request.
        Parameters:
        host - This node
        server - gen_server PID
        cast - message to send

        Sends an asynchronous request to the a gen_server and returns immediately, ignoring if the destination node or gen_server does not exist. The gen_server will call Module:handle_cast/2 to handle the request.
        Parameters:
        host - This node
        server - gen_server name
        node - node where the gen_server lives
        cast - message to send

      • handleCall

        protected abstract com.ericsson.otp.erlang.OtpErlangObject handleCall(com.ericsson.otp.erlang.OtpErlangObject cmd,
                                                                      com.ericsson.otp.erlang.OtpErlangTuple from)
                                                               throws OtpStopException,
                                                                      OtpContinueException,
                                                                      com.ericsson.otp.erlang.OtpErlangException
        Equivalent to gen_server's handle_call
        Parameters:
        cmd - The message to evaluate
        from - The caller
        Returns:
        The response to be sent to the caller
        Throws:
        OtpStopException - If the server should stop normally
        OtpContinueException - If the server should not reply anything to the caller
        com.ericsson.otp.erlang.OtpErlangException - If the server should crash
